class.name: NavigationMeshSourceGeometryData2D
class.brief_description: Container for parsed source geometry data used in navigation mesh baking.
class.description: Container for parsed source geometry data used in navigation mesh baking.

method.name: add_obstruction_outline
method.description: Adds the outline points of a shape as obstructed area.

method.name: add_traversable_outline
method.description: Adds the outline points of a shape as traversable area.

method.name: get_obstruction_outlines
method.description: Returns all the obstructed area outlines arrays.

method.name: get_traversable_outlines
method.description: Returns all the traversable area outlines arrays.

method.name: has_data
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] when parsed source geometry data exists.

method.name: set_obstruction_outlines
method.description: Sets all the obstructed area outlines arrays.

method.name: set_traversable_outlines
method.description: Sets all the traversable area outlines arrays.
